SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractScreen
Abstract base class for all game screens (e.g., welcome, main menu, gameplay).
Ali
Represents the main playable character, Mr.
Ali.AliBuilder
The AliBuilder class provides a fluent API for constructing an Ali object.
AliAnimation
 
Animation
 
AnimationFrame
Represents a single frame in the animation
AnimationInstance
Represents an individual animation instance for an entity.
AnimationLoader
Utility class for loading animations from sprite sheets (strip files) and from JSON configuration files.
AnimationLoader.AnimationConfig
Immutable record representing the configuration for a single animation.
AnimationManager
Singleton manager responsible for storing and retrieving shared animation templates.
AnimationTemplate
Represents a reusable animation template containing a sequence of frames.
App
 
Bearing2D
Represents a bearing (direction) in 2D space, measured in degrees.
ButtonUtil
Utility class for creating various buttons in the UI.
Enemy
Represents an enemy in the game.
Enemy.EnemyBuilder<T>
 
EnemyManager
Manages the creation, lifespan, and behaviour of all enemies in the game.
Entity
Represents a base entity in the game, providing common functionality for all objects within the game world.
Entity.EntityBuilder<T>
The EntityBuilder class provides a fluent API for constructing an Entity object.
FontManager
The FontManager class manages the loading and processing of fonts.
GameFrame
GameFrame serves as the primary window and core rendering engine for the game.
GameManager
 
GameOverDialogue
 
GamePanel
A component that displays all the game entities and a scrolling background.
GameplayScreen
The GameplayScreen class represents the primary screen where the actual gameplay takes place.
GameState
Represents the current game state.
GameState.State
Enum representing possible states of the game.
HitFlashEffect
A visual effect that applies a brief white flash to an entity's sprite when it is hit.
HorizontalScreenWipeEffect
 
HorizontalScrollingBackground
Represents a background image that scrolls seamlessly in a horizontal direction.
ImageManager
The ImageManager class manages the loading and processing of images.
InfoPanel
The InfoPanel displays game information (e.g., player health, elapsed time, and score) pause button for the game.
Lecturer
Represents a Lecturer enemy in the game.
Lecturer.LecturerBuilder
 
LevelConfig
Represents the configuration settings for a specific game level.
LevelLibrary
Stores static definitions for each game level.
LevelState
Tracks the current level and retrieves its configuration.
LevelType
 
MobileEntity
Represents a mobile entity in the game that can move around the game world.
MobileEntity.MobileEntityBuilder<T>
The MobileEntityBuilder class provides a fluent API for constructing an MobileEntity object.
NPCAnimation
 
PauseMenuDialogue
 
Renderable
Represents objects that can be rendered on the screen.
SoundManager
Manages audio playback for the game using a singleton pattern.
Student
Represents a Student enemy in the game.
Student.StudentBuilder
 
Subpanel
Abstract base class for all game screens (e.g., main menu, gameplay).
TimedVisualEffect
An abstract base class for time-based visual effects, providing common functionality such as tracking duration and completion.
TimerPanel
 
UIConstants
 
UIGameTime
 
Updateable
 
VisualEffect
 
WelcomeScreen
The WelcomeScreen is the initial screen shown to the player when launching the game.
Yapper
Represents a Yapper enemy in the game.
Yapper.YapperBuilder
